Action.author: knkski
Action.body: ~grkvlt : I've added a {{.dockerignore}} file in https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-seth/pull/48|https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-seth/pull/48. , which cut down on the size of the docker image. Is that what you had in mind when you created this ticket, or are there more steps to complete this?
